job.title: Vertriebsingenieur (m/w) Hydraulik (VH)
job.plaincontent:
Liebherr Machines Bulle SA ist das Kompetenzzentrum für Verbrennungsmotoren (Diesel- und Gasmotoren), Hydraulikkomponenten (Axialkolbenmaschinen und Ventile) sowie Pumpenverteilergetriebe. Das Unternehmen entwickelt und fertigt diverse Produkte, die in den Bereichen Hoch- und Tiefbau, Bergbau, Landwirtschaft, Dezentrale Energie, Maschinen- und Anlagenbau sowie Luftfahrt zur Anwendung kommen.
Aufgaben
- Bearbeitung und Abschluss von Kundenprojekten sowie Nachverfolgung von Angeboten - Projektleitung, Spezifizierung und Systemberatung - Technische Betreuung unserer Kunden in allen Fragen zur Applikation Hydraulikkomponenten, mit den Schwerpunkten Axialkolbenmaschinen - Anfertigung von Verkaufsunterlagen zur Akquisition neuer Kunden und Unterstützung bei der Ausarbeitung von Verträgen - Erstellung von Lieferumfängen und Lastenheften - Bearbeitung von Bestellungen, Überwachung der Liefertermine für Prototypen und Kundenkorrespondenz - Organisation und Unterstützung bei Inbetriebnahme - Marktbeobachtung und Wettbewerbsanalysen
Qualifikation
- Erfolgreich abgeschlossenes Studium der Fachrichtung Maschinenbau - Sehr gutes Fachwissen im Bereich Fluidtechnik, Mobilen Arbeitsmaschinen und anderen Anwendungsbereichen - Mehrjährige Berufserfahrung im Vertrieb von Hydraulikkomponenten, im Speziellen Axialkolbenmaschinen - Sehr gute Deutsch- und Englischkenntnisse, Französischkenntnisse sind von Vorteil - Hohe Beratungskompetenz, Kommunikationsfähigkeit und Durchsetzungsfähigkeit, Selbstständigkeit, Flexibilität und Teamfähigkeit - Hohe Reisebereitschaft
Unser Angebot
Es erwartet Sie ein sicherer Arbeitsplatz in einer erfolgreichen Firmengruppe. Zudem bieten wir Ihnen Sozialleistungen eines modernen Unternehmens sowie eine leistungsgerechte Vergütung

job.title: .NET Software Engineer (m/f/x)
job.plaincontent:
Liebherr Machines Bulle SA is the centre of excellence for combustion engines (diesel and gas engines) and hydraulic components. The company develops and produces various products which are used in the fields of building construction and civil engineering, mining, agriculture, decentralised energy, machine and plant engineering, as well as aerospace.
Responsibilities
- In this position you will actively develop and maintain our engine diagnostic software suite (fat client application, web app, mobile app, back-end services and more) - You will be involved in all stages of our engineering lifecycle (analysis, prototyping, implementation, testing, commissioning, scale, maintenance) - In close collaboration with other subject matter experts, you will play a key role in development of software designs - You will create innovative solutions to meet our company’s technical needs and you will contribute to design the future of systems - Finally, you will deliver tested, high quality code that performs well including documentation and demonstration of solutions
Requirements
- You have successfully completed an engineering degree in computer science with emphasis on software development, algorithms, data structures, and object-oriented concepts. Experience in lieu of a degree will be considered - You can present a proven track record in .NET software development including significant experience with the most recent Framework versions - You have in-depth knowledge of C#, design patterns, asynchronous programming as well as .NET related technologies, architecture and development methodologies - Experience with cloud computing as well as familiarity with working in Agile and DevOps culture would be an advantage - You are fluent in English and have very good command of one of our company languages (French or German) - You have excellent analytical and modeling skills paired with good communicational and organizational skills, you are flexible and customer orientated and you enjoy being a valued team member with a strong ability to work with technical experts
Our offer We offer an exciting activity in a competent, dynamic and open minded team and the opportunity to make a difference in a fascinating environment characterized by innovative technology
[[filter6]] [[recruiterName]] [[custRecruiterContact]]
job.htmlcontent:
Liebherr Machines Bulle SA is the centre of excellence for combustion engines (diesel and gas engines) and hydraulic components. The company develops and produces various products which are used in the fields of building construction and civil engineering, mining, agriculture, decentralised energy, machine and plant engineering, as well as aerospace.

 

 

 

Responsibilities

  • In this position you will actively develop and maintain our engine diagnostic software suite (fat client application, web app, mobile app, back-end services and more)
  • You will be involved in all stages of our engineering lifecycle (analysis, prototyping, implementation, testing, commissioning, scale, maintenance)
  • In close collaboration with other subject matter experts, you will play a key role in development of software designs
  • You will create innovative solutions to meet our company’s technical needs and you will contribute to design the future of systems
  • Finally, you will deliver tested, high quality code that performs well including documentation and demonstration of solutions

 

Requirements

  • You have successfully completed an engineering degree in computer science with emphasis on software development, algorithms, data structures, and object-oriented concepts. Experience in lieu of a degree will be considered
  • You can present a proven track record in .NET software development including significant experience with the most recent Framework versions
  • You have in-depth knowledge of C#, design patterns, asynchronous programming as well as .NET related technologies, architecture and development methodologies
  • Experience with cloud computing as well as familiarity with working in Agile and DevOps culture would be an advantage
  • You are fluent in English and have very good command of one of our company languages (French or German)
  • You have excellent analytical and modeling skills paired with good communicational and organizational skills, you are flexible and customer orientated and you enjoy being a valued team member with a strong ability to work with technical experts

 
Our offer
We offer an exciting activity in a competent, dynamic and open minded team and the opportunity to make a difference in a fascinating environment characterized by innovative technology

job.title: Enterprise Application Developer (m/w)
job.plaincontent:
Liebherr Machines Bulle SA is the centre of excellence for combustion engines (diesel and gas engines) and hydraulic components. The company develops and produces various products which are used in the fields of building construction and civil engineering, mining, agriculture, decentralised energy, machine and plant engineering, as well as aerospace.
Responsibilities
- Analyze of business needs to implement solutions with BizTalk / .Net / SQL - Definition of the concept for solutions - Development and administration of Microsoft BizTalk Solution - Development of Microsoft Report Server / Powerbi and SQL solutions (SSIS, SSAS) - Development of Microsoft .Net Solution (Web Service, Web site) and of Azure Solution - Development of AgilePoint NX - Project Management - 2nd level of support
Requirements
- Bachelor or Master degree in Computer Science - Certification in BizTalk, SQL, .Net, ITIL - 3-5 years experience in .net software development, BizTalk, BI; experience with MS Azure would be a big advantage - Very good knowledge in French, good knowledge in German and in English - Very good knowledge in Microsoft BizTalk, Microsoft SQL, Development .Net and knowledge in Microsoft Sharepoint - Curiosity, organization skills, ability to take initiatives, communication skills and autonomy
Our offer
We offer an exciting activity in a young and dynamic team, payment commensurate with your skills and social benefits of a modern company

job.htmlcontent:
Liebherr Machines Bulle SA is the centre of excellence for combustion engines (diesel and gas engines) and hydraulic components. The company develops and produces various products which are used in the fields of building construction and civil engineering, mining, agriculture, decentralised energy, machine and plant engineering, as well as aerospace.

 

 

 

Responsibilities

 

  • Analyze of business needs to implement solutions with BizTalk / .Net / SQL
  • Definition of the concept for solutions
  • Development and administration of Microsoft BizTalk Solution
  • Development of Microsoft Report Server / Powerbi and SQL solutions (SSIS, SSAS)
  • Development of Microsoft .Net Solution (Web Service, Web site) and of Azure Solution
  • Development of AgilePoint NX
  • Project Management
  • 2nd level of support

 

Requirements

 

  • Bachelor or Master degree in Computer Science
  • Certification in BizTalk, SQL, .Net, ITIL
  • 3-5 years experience in .net software development, BizTalk, BI; experience with MS Azure would be a big advantage
  • Very good knowledge in French, good knowledge in German and in English
  • Very good knowledge in Microsoft BizTalk, Microsoft SQL, Development .Net and knowledge in Microsoft Sharepoint
  • Curiosity, organization skills, ability to take initiatives, communication skills and autonomy

 

Our offer

 

We offer an exciting activity in a young and dynamic team, payment commensurate with your skills and social benefits of a modern company

job.title: Netzelektriker/in oder Elektroinstallateur/in
job.plaincontent:
GEWINNE ENERGIE mit der EWD Elektrizitätswerk Davos AG – seit 1893 verantwortlich für die Stromversorgung der Gemeinde Davos.
Zur Ergänzung unseres Teams im Bereich Netz- & Anlagenbau suchen wir ab sofort oder nach Vereinba- rung eine/n
Netzelektriker/in oder Elektroinstallateur/in
mit Bereitschaft für Umschulung auf Netz- /
Anlagenbau
Das Aufgabengebiet Kabelarbeiten im Nieder- und Mittelspannungsverteilnetz Montagen an Kabelschutzrohranlagen Neubau- und Instandhaltung an den Transformatorenstationen und Niederspannungsverteil- kabinen Arbeiten an der Öffentlichen Beleuchtung
Das Anforderungsprofil Abgeschlossene Ausbildung als Netzelektriker/-in oder Elektroinstallateur/in mit Bereitschaft für Umschulung auf Netz- / Anlagenbau Berufserfahrung Führerausweis der Kategorie B Selbstständig arbeitende/r und belastbare/r Teamplayer/in gute körperliche Verfassung Freude am Arbeiten im Freien Genauigkeit, Zuverlässigkeit und Verantwortungsbewusstsein gehören auch zu Ihren Stärken
In unserem modernen Unternehmen bieten wir eine verantwortungsvolle Stelle in einem ab- wechslungsreichen Tätigkeitsgebiet mit Entwicklungspotenzial in einer Branche mit Zukunft, mo- derne Anstellungsbedingungen, u.a. flexible Arbeitszeitmodelle, zeitgemässe Sozialleistungen, Förderung von Aus- und Weiterbildungen und dies alles inmitten einer traumhaften Umgebung in einem dynamischen Team.
Nähere Auskünfte zu dieser interessanten Stelle erhalten Sie gerne von Herrn A. Sprecher, Geschäftsbereichsleiter Netz- & Anlagenbau unter der Telefonnummer 081 415 38 00.
Auf Ihre vollständigen Bewerbungsunterlagen freut sich Frau Manuela Saxer, Personalwesen. m.saxer@ewd.ch
EWD ELEKTRIZITÄTSWERK DAVOS AG Talstrasse 35 - 7270 Davos Platz Tel. 081 415 38 00 - Fax. 081 415 38 01 info@ewd.ch - www.ewd.ch
